title: Short-term Intensive Course for Mobile-based Graphic Design Practical Skills Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Mobile platform-based education centered on solving situational practical tasks for in-service graphic designers.

learning_goals: Learners can apply methods for utilizing ≥3 real-time collaborative design tools via mobile learning platforms
Learners can analyze mobile-optimized design workflows and apply them to ≥2 types of practical projects
Learners can demonstrate design problem-solving competencies with ≥80% achievement in weekly formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
